tag_list: internet-marketing, affiliate-marketing, online-marketing, internet-advertising, marketing, advertising
overview:
Aaron Joachim is an Affiliate Marketing Professional, well versed in all payment models and traffic types.

Aaron entered Affiliate marketing in 2006 working for one of the largest multi-million dollar Internet Marketing firms in Florida, TheUseful (aka Q-Interactive).

Over the years Aaron has worked with Fortune 500 and Fortune 1000 clients. Managing both high Yield and Strategic accounts by developing and delivering solutions that meet Advertiser needs.

Currently he’s working with AdShare Media on creating an innovative Lead Generation product that can meet the growing need for data in a market increasingly dependent on data to effectively monetize and manage their online spend.
